title: Budgie 10.9 Desktop Adds Initial Wayland Support, Redesigned Bluetooth Applet
description:
Budgie 10.9 desktop environment is now available with initial Wayland ports for various components and applets, as well as a redesigned Bluetooth applet.

The post Budgie 10.9 Desktop Adds Initial Wayland Support, Redesigned Bluetooth Applet appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Arch Linux-Based SystemRescue 11 Released with Linux Kernel 6.6 LTS
description:
SystemRescue 11 live Linux system rescue toolkit is now available for download. This release comes with the Linux 6.6 LTS kernel, new packages, and new features.

The post Arch Linux-Based SystemRescue 11 Released with Linux Kernel 6.6 LTS appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
